:;xPON SFP ONU

Stick		   SoC		NAND		Mode	4-port EthUni	2.5Gb
V-SOL V2801F	   RTL9601CI	8MB (64Mb)	VEIP, PPTP	Yes	Mod
ODI DFP-34X-2C2	   RTL9601D	8MB (64Mb)	VEIP, PPTP	220304	Yes
Ubiquiti UFiber	   RTL9601CI	8MB (64Mb)	VEIP, PPTP	No	No
T&W TWCGPON657	   RTL9601CI	16MB (128Mb)	VEIP, PPTP	V1.9.0	Mod
Nokia G-010S-Q	   RTL9601CI	16MB (128Mb)	?	?	?

Note: ODI DFP-43X-2C2 using Realtek RTL9601D processor
V-SOL V2801F, T&W TWCGPON657 using Realtek RTL9601CI processor

Skyworth GN630E	   RTL960x ?	?		VEIP, PPTP	Yes	Yes, 1 port
D-Link DPN-FX3060V RTL9607DQ	256MB		VEIP, PPTP	Yes	No

Note: The WebGUI of Skyworth GN630E look alot like V-SOL V2801F and HGU ODI Firmware
